import React from "react"; import project1 from "../assets/images/project1.jpg"; import project2 from "../assets/images/project2.png"; import project3 from "../assets/images/project3.png"; import { FaEnvelope, FaWhatsapp, FaMapMarkerAlt } from "react-icons/fa"; import { FaCheckCircle } from "react-icons/fa"; import { FaPaperPlane } from "react-icons/fa"; import profileImage from "../assets/images/IMG-20231206-WA0022.jpg"; export default function AboutSection() { return (
{/* ======= About Section ======= */}
{/* LEFT - Profile Image */}
{/* RIGHT - Text Content */}

About Me

Hi! I’m Dimas Faizal, a passionate designer and frontend developer based in Jakarta. With a background in visual design and a love for coding, I specialize in building websites and apps that are not only stunning but also user-friendly.

{["UI/UX Design", "Web Development", "Branding"].map((skill, i) => ( {skill} ))} {/* Motion Graphics di baris baru tapi lebar sesuai teks */}
Motion Graphics
{/* BUTTON - Let’s Connect */}
{/* ======= My Skills ======= */}

My Skills

{[ { title: "UI/UX Design", desc: "Figma, Adobe XD, Sketch", color: "from-purple-200 to-pink-200" }, { title: "Frontend Dev", desc: "React, Vue, Tailwind", color: "from-blue-200 to-blue-100" }, { title: "Branding", desc: "Logo, Identity, Print", color: "from-yellow-200 to-yellow-100" }, { title: "Motion Graphic", desc: "After Effects, Lottie", color: "from-purple-100 to-blue-100" }, ].map((item, i) => (

{item.title}

{item.desc}

))}
{/* ======= Portfolio ======= */}

Portfolio

{[project1, project2, project3].map((img, i) => (

{i === 0 ? "Dashboard Web App" : i === 1 ? "Mobile App Landing" : "Motion Graphic"}

))}
